header.title: AITUVERSE: Your Virtual Learning Space
header.description: Discover a revolutionizing university learning! Dive into a world where learning is not just comfortable but exciting and highly productive for everyone.

interactivity.title: Interactivity
interactivity.description: AITUVERSE offers the possibility of active interaction between teachers and students during virtual classes. This helps to create a more lively learning environment.

uniqueness.title: Uniqueness
uniqueness.description: The platform stands out for its features, which make the virtual learning process more exciting and interesting than the traditional one.

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.description: The use of interactive boards allows students to actively participate, usage of chatting tools support communication, making learning more engaging.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Global virtual learning expands the boundaries of the concept of traditional education, making it effective and accessible to all.

basic.title: Basic
basic.features: Fast start your exploration with this level. Access to 2 beginner-level classes/mo., limited access to community forums, monthly newsletter with tips and updates, 24/7 email support.

standard.title: Standard
standard.features: Everything in Basic, plus full access to live virtual classes, priority support for questions, exclusive access to bonus content, discounts on premium courses, getting branded merchandise.

premium.title: Premium
premium.features: Everything in Standard, plus one-on-one sessions with experts, personalized feedback on assignments, early access to courses and updates, invitations to exclusive virtual events.

footer.cta: Take The Next Step In Your Academic Journey
